featured.text: Benson married Julie soon after he had _____ her heart and gained her parents’ approval.

definition.zh_def: 本森（Benson）是一個常見的英語姓氏，通常用作人名或地名。
definition.en_def: Benson is a common English surname, often used as a first name or place name.
definition.example: Benson is my best friend from college.
